name: Nike Dri-FIT Strike
description: The Nike Dri-FIT Strike Top features design details specifically tailored for soccer’s rising stars. A slim, streamlined fit ensures that nothing comes between you and the ball. Sweat-wicking fabric helps keep you cool and composed while you fine tune your skills. This product is made with 100% recycled polyester fibers.
specifications: Slim fit for a tailored feel

name: Nike Dri-FIT Strike
description: The Nike Dri-FIT Strike Shorts feature design details specifically tailored for soccer’s rising stars. A relaxed, easy fit works together with sweat-wicking fabric to help keep you cool and composed while fine-tuning your skills. This product is made with 100% recycled polyester fibers.
specifications: Slim fit for a tailored feel

name: Nike Academy Socks
description: The Nike Academy Socks are designed to keep you comfortable during play with soft, sweat-wicking fabric with arch support.

name: Team 19 Short Sleeve
description: Trophies are won from hard work. Built for hot days on the soccer field, this jersey keeps you cool with breathable, quick-drying fabric. It's cut for a full range of motion, so you stay ready for the next move.

name: Tastigo 19 Shorts
description: Every game is a chance to redefine your limits. These soccer shorts keep you dry and comfortable, so you can focus on the challenge ahead. They're made of soft, sweat-wicking fabric lined with breathable mesh.

name: Team Speed Soccer OTC Socks
description: Every practice takes you closer to your goal. These adidas soccer socks are made with moisture-wicking yarn to help feet stay dry. A cushioned heel and toe keep you comfortable through drills and scrimmages, while arch and ankle compression provide extra support.
specifications: 78% nylon, 12% natural latex rubber, 8% polyester, 2% elastane
Cushioned heel and toes with arch and ankle compression
